Prompts.SystemPrompt:
I will provide you with captions for images. For each one, remove the following content from the text and then return to me the remaining text unaltered:
- Any reference to it being an image, e.g. "This image shows" or "The image contains" or "A picture of".
- Any reference to the style of the image itself, e.g. "an anime style" or "a digital illustration" or "a cartoon".
